pages.title: Container Roles
pages.text: $(bold)INPUT$() (Blue) — The companion pulls items FROM these containers (e.g., furnace output, farm collection chest).$(br2)$(bold)OUTPUT$() (Orange) — The companion pushes items TO these containers (e.g., sorted storage, processing input).$(br2)$(bold)STORAGE$() (Green) — General storage that the companion manages and sorts through.

pages.title: Logistics Goal
pages.text: In $(bold)AUTO$() mode with a home position set, the companion automatically moves items between tagged containers based on their roles.$(br2)Containers must be within 32 blocks of the home position. Maximum 32 tagged containers (configurable).
